Title: Object: Papyrus Anastasi 1
Description: Papyrus Anastasi I; Hieratic literary text sheet 7B : "The Satirical Letter".
Curator's comments: Text edition: H.-W Fischer-Elfert, Die satirische Streitschrift des Papyrus Anastasi I: Textzusammenstellung. Kleine Ägyptische Texte 1992a [1983]. This manuscript is available on T.L.A (http://aaew.bbaw.de/tla/). Commentary: H.-W. Fischer-Elfert, Die satirische Streitschrift des Papyrus Anastasi I.: Übersetzung und Kommentar. ÄA 44 1986. English translation in E. F. Wente, Letters from Ancient Egypt, pp. 98-110. Writings from the Ancient World 1; Atlanta: Society of Biblical Literature 1990.
Bibliographic references: Fischer-Elfert 1992 / Die satirische Streitschrift des Papyrus Anastasi I
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381199) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381199)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bleached, insect attack, loss Black ink Red ink Backed: brown paper Displayed in Room 63 until 1997 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B
